named-query.name: product.getByNameAndCompany
named-query.query: FROM ProductEntity p WHERE p.name = :name AND p.productGroup.company.name = :company

named-query.name: product.getGenericByProductGroup
named-query.query: FROM ProductEntity p WHERE p.productGroup.name = :productGroupName AND p.generic = TRUE

named-query.name: product.getAll
named-query.query: FROM ProductEntity p ORDER BY p.priority

named-query.name: product.getAllByCompany
named-query.query: FROM ProductEntity p WHERE p.productGroup.company.id = :companyId ORDER BY p.priority

named-query.name: product.getAllEnabled
named-query.query: FROM ProductEntity p WHERE p.enabled = TRUE ORDER BY p.priority

named-query.name: product.getAllDisabled
named-query.query: FROM ProductEntity p WHERE (p.enabled = FALSE OR p.enabled IS NULL) ORDER BY p.priority

named-query.name: product.getAllEnabledByCompany
named-query.query: FROM ProductEntity p WHERE p.productGroup.company.id = :companyId AND p.enabled = TRUE ORDER BY p.priority

named-query.name: product.getAllDisabledByCompany
named-query.query: FROM ProductEntity p WHERE p.productGroup.company.id = :companyId AND (p.enabled = FALSE OR p.enabled IS NULL) ORDER BY p.priority
